name: Web Development
summary: Modern web applications with cutting-edge technologies. Full-stack development, responsive design, API integrations, and scalable cloud solutions.

seo.title: Web Development Services | CodeX Terminal
seo.description: Professional web development with modern frameworks. Custom web applications, responsive design, API development, and cloud deployment.

hero.headline: Modern Web Development
hero.subheadline: Build fast, scalable web applications with cutting-edge technologies
hero.description: From responsive websites to complex web applications, we deliver modern solutions that perform excellently across all devices and scale with your business growth.

features.title: Full-Stack Development
features.description: Complete web solutions with both frontend and backend development using modern JavaScript frameworks and server technologies.

features.title: Responsive Design
features.description: Mobile-first approach ensuring perfect user experience across all devices from smartphones to desktop computers.

features.title: API Development
features.description: RESTful and GraphQL APIs with proper authentication, documentation, and integration capabilities for third-party services.

features.title: Performance Optimization
features.description: Fast-loading websites with optimized code, image compression, lazy loading, and CDN integration for global performance.

features.title: Cloud Deployment
features.description: Scalable cloud hosting solutions with automatic scaling, monitoring, backups, and CI/CD pipeline integration.

features.title: SEO & Analytics
features.description: Built-in SEO optimization, structured data, analytics integration, and performance monitoring for better visibility.

process.title: Discovery & Planning
process.description: Understand your business goals, target audience, and technical requirements to create a comprehensive development strategy.

process.title: Design & Architecture
process.description: Create wireframes, design mockups, and plan the technical architecture for optimal performance and user experience.

process.title: Development & Testing
process.description: Build your web application using agile methodology with continuous testing, code reviews, and quality assurance.

process.title: Deployment & Launch
process.description: Deploy to production with proper configuration, security measures, performance optimization, and monitoring setup.

process.title: Maintenance & Support
process.description: Provide ongoing support, security updates, performance monitoring, and feature enhancements as your business grows.

specialties.name: Progressive Web Apps (PWA)
specialties.description: Native app-like experiences with offline functionality, push notifications, and home screen installation.

specialties.name: Single Page Applications (SPA)
specialties.description: Fast, interactive web applications with smooth navigation and real-time updates without page reloads.

specialties.name: Headless CMS Integration
specialties.description: Flexible content management with headless CMS solutions like Strapi, Contentful, or Sanity.

specialties.name: Real-time Applications
specialties.description: Live chat, collaboration tools, and real-time dashboards using WebSocket and server-sent events.

specialties.name: Microservices Architecture
specialties.description: Scalable backend architecture with containerized services, API gateways, and independent deployments.

specialties.name: JAMstack Development
specialties.description: Modern web architecture with JavaScript, APIs, and pre-built markup for better performance and security.

benefits: Fast loading times and excellent performance
